import React,{useContext,useEffect} from 'react'; import navbarStyle from '../Sass/navbarStyle.scss' import triAngle from '../Sass/triaAngleStyle.scss' import Link from 'next/link'; import LanguageFlag from './LanguageFlag'; import { Context } from '../context/Context'; const langArray = [ ['en','English'], ['ar','العربية'], ['fa','فارسی'], ['fr','français'], ['de','Deutsch'] ]; const Navbar = ()=>{ useEffect(()=>{ const language = window.navigator.userLanguage || window.navigator.language; },[]); const {lang,openLangDrop,money,navbarText} = useContext(Context); return (
{ langArray.map(element=>( )) }

{navbarText.menu[`${lang[0]}`].home} {navbarText.menu[`${lang[0]}`].about}

{navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].all} {navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].istanbul} {navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].bursa} {navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].sakarya} {navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].bodrum} {navbarText.properties[`${lang[0]}`].usa}
{navbarText.menu[`${lang[0]}`].services} {navbarText.menu[`${lang[0]}`].articles} {navbarText.menu[`${lang[0]}`].contact}
); }; export default Navbar;
